quotes: The tracker now covers 107 countries—up from 75 two years ago—highlighting clear momentum on developing national standards, conducting baseline assessments, and integrating climate resilience.
This updated analysis will inform upcoming global discussions, including a joint WHO/UNICEF webinar on 29 July and the next Global Progress Report in October.

organizations.name: Howden Foundation
quotes: ClimateWorks is thrilled to partner with Howden Foundation Laudes Foundation, Quadrature Climate Foundation and The Rockefeller Foundation to establish a new Adaptation and Resilience Fund (A&R Fund).

organizations.name: World Resources Institute
quotes: Recent research from World Resources Institute found that, for every $1 invested in adaptation, more than $10.50 in benefits can be generated over 10 years.

organizations.name: WHO
quotes: Thanks to strong engagement and inputs from countries around the world, WHO and UNICEF have just updated the country progress tracker on water, sanitation, hygiene (WASH) and waste services in health care facilities.
